attributes.action: stand up for British people! And come up with new immigration policy
attributes.additional_details: Stop letting people come to this country from France, they know we are weak and that we offer immigrants better life's than we do some of our own citizens. If they are out of there country then they are already free of tyrants, war and danger, why do they need to move to the UK, how about germany, France, belgium, Russia? And all the other European countries
